message.content:
cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with optimization problems involving fractions and weighted sums, which are common topics in information theory (cs.IT) and game theory (cs.GT). The use of matroid and polymatroid constraints suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of discrete mathematics (cs.DS) and combinatorics (cs.DM). Finally, the mention of mechanism design hints at a possible connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
